attacks.name: Fascinate
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with the Defending Pokémon. This attack can't be used if your opponent has no Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
